title: Remove Passive Lifesteal from Nasus.
body: Nasus is running wild in the low Iron-Gold areas of the ranked table and players are having such hard times fighting him. Players have to decide to either ban him or play him because they do not want to face him. I feel if his passive life steal was removed he would be far less of a hassle to the lower Elo players. Unless there is a full rework in the making for him I think this could be a decent way to pull him back from being a priority ban/pick.

replies.body: Tbh the fix to him is the same fix they should apply to Draven. Don’t let the bonus damage on their q’s apply lifesteal. Suddenly problem is solved.

Not at all, as i am a Nasus player I find he is just to strong and needs a rework or a nerf.  There is no hate to the champ just a hope for the meta to not be based around whether he should be played or banned because he is such a late game carry. Like i responded to the other post, his Passive states "Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal." So by that he should not heal at all from hitting minions.

It's really the only thing that allows him to survive in lane early on, when he's weakest.  Buying a healing reduction item in lane will really shut down his dueling pressure and ability to all in you or 2v1 a gank.
